author: tersec
content: https://dora.pectra-devnet-6.ethpandaops.io/slot/103502 is the result of a Reth timeout, and it seems to be timing out in general at this point

author: jochembrouwer

author: jochembrouwer
content:
I checked all combo's and the only one up is lodestar-ethjs https://dora.pectra-devnet-6.ethpandaops.io/validator/54276

I've restarted all others, but this is likely the issue that we are too slow to catch up (or this will take a super long time). Note that our client is still single threaded ðŸ˜…  We should really start to multithread it, to not have everything (devp2p, txpool, evm, rpc) run in a single thread ðŸ˜…

author: potuz
content: My config does not include lighthouse at all

author: potuz
content:
```
$ cat ../kurtosis/kurtosis.conf
participants:
  # Prysm
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: prysm-bn-custom-image:latest
    vc_image: prysm-vc-custom-image:latest
    count: 2
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
      - --verbosity=debug
      - --disable-peer-scorer

  # Teku
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:epbs
    count: 2
    cl_max_mem: 4096
    cl_extra_params:
      - --Xp2p-gossip-scoring-enabled=false

global_log_level: info

network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  eip7732_fork_epoch: 2
  min_validator_withdrawability_delay: 1
  shard_committee_period: 1
  seconds_per_slot: 12
  churn_limit_quotient: 16
  preregistered_validator_count: 16384
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 4096 # replace this with validaor count per node

additional_services:
  - dora
  - prometheus_grafana

#  - spamoor_blob
#  - tx_spammer
#  - assertoor
```
